CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains four activities and closes door
MOT is standing in room holding a bag and CHI is not on screen
MOT walks towards desk with boxes
MOT walks towards middle of room
CHI turns around and follows MOT to center of room
MOT looks at contents of box
CHI reaches out for contents of box . <aft> CHI picks up contents of box
CHI looks and points to something in front of her then looks at MOT
MOT looks in the direction CHI is pointing then at CHI
CHI puts book down on floor and starts to get up
CHI turns torso around so she faces box
CHI turns torso towards book and reaches out for it
MOT puts lid on top of box
CHI picks up book and turns around towards MOT
MOT holds book up so it faces CHI
MOT looks at back of book
CHI looks at back of book
MOT looks at and points to item
MOT turns book so CHI can see cover
MOT looks at and points to item on cover
MOT looks at and points to item on cover
MOT looks at and points to picture on cover . <aft> MOT taps picture
<bef> MOT looks at CHI . MOT looks at item
<bef> MOT looks at and points to something on cover . MOT looks at CHI
<1 .> MOT leans forward and touches CHI's cheek
<bef> CHI looks down at box then at book nodding head yes
MOT looks at and points to something on cover
MOT leans back and turns book so cover faces her
<bef> MOT turns page . MOT leans forward
MOT turns book so CHI can see pages . <aft> MOT gets up on her knees
MOT sits down on her knees
MOT looks at and points to something on page
CHI moves head closer to book and tilts it
MOT looks at and points to something on page
CHI looks at what MOT points to
MOT lets finger run across page
MOT lets finger run across page
CHI looks at sun glasses next to her on the floor
MOT looks at and points to something on page
MOT looks at and points to something different on page
MOT looks at and points to a different place on page
CHI points to something on page and then looks up
CHI turns head and looks at sun glasses
CHI points in the direction of desk
MOT looks at and points to something on page
CHI looks at what MOT points to
CHI pulls lips back revealing her teeth
MOT looks at and points to picture
CHI looks at and points to something
MOT looks at and points to picture on page
CHI leans towards MOT revealing her teeth again
CHI looks at and points to something on page
MOT looks at and points to something on page
MOT looks and points to something else on page
MOT looks up at CHI then looks in the direction of boxes
CHI looks to her left then at pages
<4-6> MOT looks at CHI . <6 .> MOT points to something on page
CHI leans over towards book and holds onto it with one hand
MOT lifts up lid and picks up box under it
CHI sits down and watches MOT
CHI watches as MOT puts book back in box
CHI looks at and points to something in front of her
CHI runs towards sun glasses on floor
CHI sits down and picks up sun glasses
MOT walks towards where she sat before
MOT sits down next to CHI
CHI reaches hand out towards box
MOT looks at contents of box
CHI looks at contents of box
MOT starts to put puppet on her hand
CHI puts her puppet on floor
MOT reaches out for parrot puppet . <aft> MOT picks up parrot
CHI looks at MOT's hand . <aft> CHI follows MOT's hand with eyes
CHI puts Cookie_Monster puppet on her hand
MOT looks at and taps Cookie_Monster puppet
MOT puts parrot puppet on her hand
CHI turns puppet around so it faces her
CHI moves hand so it looks like puppet is talking
CHI puts puppet up to her mouth pretending to eat it
CHI takes puppet away from mouth and holds it up in front of her then moves it towards box
MOT moves hand so it looks as if parrot puppet is eating Cookie_Monster puppet
CHI bangs hand with Cookie_Monster down in box
CHI looks at Cookie_Monster puppet then at parrot puppet
Cookie_Monster puppet flies off CHI's hand and lands behind her
MOT lifts arms up in mock terror
CHI turns head to see where Cookie_Monster puppet went
CHI turns torso towards Cookie_Monster puppet . <aft> CHI crawls closer to puppet and sits down
MOT fidgets with parrot puppets wings
MOT holds parrot puppet up so it faces CHI and moves hand so it looks as if puppet is talking
CHI puts Cookie_Monster puppet on her hand
MOT holds puppet out toward CHI
CHI holds puppet out toward MOT
CHI moves hand a little closer to MOT
CHI turns hand around so puppet faces her
MOT moves hand so it looks as if puppet is talking
MOT moves hand so it looks as if puppet is talking
<bef> CHI moves hand so it looks as if puppet is nodding its head
MOT moves hand so it looks as if puppet is talking
MOT extends hand with puppet to CHI
MOT waves CHI closer with hand
CHI gets down on hands and knees . <aft> CHI crawls towards MOT
<1-3> MOT moves sun glasses out of the way
<10> MOT pushes some of CHI's hair away from CHI's forehead
CHI looks at mirror then at MOT
MOT waves CHI closer with puppet
CHI holds Cookie_Monster puppet up and moves hand so it looks as if puppet is nodding
MOT moves hand so it looks as if parrot puppet is talking
CHI lets hand with puppet leans against her shoulder and holds onto puppet with other hand
MOT moves hand so it looks as if puppet is talking
MOT lets hand holding puppet rest on her leg
CHI bends down in knees and quickly straightens up
MOT holds up parrot puppet and moves hand so it looks as if is puppet is talking
MOT moves hand so it looks as if puppet is talking
<aft> CHI puts Cookie_Monster puppet into mouth of parrot puppet
CHI pulls hand back and walks a few steps backwards
CHI looks at parrot puppet then at Cookie_Monster puppet
MOT leans face against parrot puppet
MOT looks at parrot puppet . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI holds Cookie_Monster puppet into herself and hugs it . <aft> CHI looks at parrot puppet
MOT leans head against parrot puppet
CHI imitates MOT and pats her own puppet
MOT pretends she is kissing puppet
CHI pretends she is kissing puppet
CHI walks towards MOT and puts Cookie_Monster puppet up to MOT's mouth
CHI walks a few steps backwards
CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks down
<bef> CHI walks towards middle of floor . CHI puts Cookie_Monster on edge of box and turns towards MOT
<bef> MOT looks at Cookie_Monster puppet . MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT and shakes head no
CHI reaches out for parrot puppet
CHI looks at parrot puppet and shakes head no
CHI pulls puppet off MOT's hand
CHI drops parrot puppet in box
CHI puts Cookie_Monster puppet in box
CHI straightens up then bends down and picks up sun glasses
CHI puts sun glasses on a box then turns around
CHI walks back to where she was before
CHI rearranges her position so she it sitting down
CHI looks and points in the direction of boxes
noises of boxes being put down and lifted up are heard
CHI sits in the middle of the room looking at MOT
CHI holds hands up in front of her
CHI moves a little to her left
MOT looks at box . <3-4> MOT points to number on box
MOT starts to take lid off
MOT looks at contents of box
MOT takes a piece of paper and turns it over . <aft> MOT gives paper to CHI and pushes box a little bit
CHI looks at contents of box then at paper MOT picks up
CHI holds hand out for paper . <aft> CHI takes paper and puts it down next to her
MOT takes another piece of paper and puts in on floor
CHI reaches out for crayon in box . <aft> CHI picks up crayon
CHI looks at crayon in box
CHI transfers crayon form one hand to the other
CHI reaches out for another crayon in box
CHI transfers crayon to other hand . <aft> CHI reaches out for another crayon in box
CHI looks at crayons . <aft> CHI looks at crayon in box
<aft> CHI holds crayon out toward MOT
CHI looks at crayon in MOT's hand
CHI puts one crayon down between her legs
<aft> CHI looks down at her crayon
CHI looks at crayon briefly then holds crayon up in the air
CHI moves hand with crayon towards paper . <aft> CHI puts hand on paper
MOT picks up lid and paper
MOT puts paper on top of lid
MOT puts hand holding crayon on paper
CHI turns head and looks at paper next to her
CHI picks up paper next to her
CHI puts paper on top of paper MOT is drawing on
CHI looks down between her legs
MOT puts hand holding crayon on paper
CHI turns head and looks at MOT's hand
<3 .> MOT writes above numbers on paper
CHI lies down on stomach behind box
CHI puts crayon to the lower right corner of box . <aft> CHI starts drawing
MOT writes the letter a . <aft> MOT writes the letter b
CHI is now sitting on her knees
CHI bends down over lid and puts hands on it . <aft> CHI starts to draw
CHI looks at crayon in her hand then at paper
<7> MOT starts to make a circle
CHI moves a little closer to MOT
<4> MOT starts to draw a circle
CHI straightens up and holds arm out to the sides
MOT looks at paper then at crayon CHI reaches out for
CHI turns head and looks at crayon next to her
MOT looks at paper . <7 .> MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks at crayon then at paper
CHI holds a crayon out in front of her
MOT nods head yes once and looks at paper
CHI bends over paper and puts hand on paper
CHI falls all the way back
CHI gets up on hands and knees
CHI gets up and turns around so she is facing MOT . <aft> CHI looks at paper
CHI turns around so she has her back to MOT
CHI turns around and looks at MOT
CHI stops in front of MOT
CHI starts to run around MOT and the drawing
MOT puts arm out in front of CHI to block her way
MOT blocks CHI's way with arm
MOT pulls arm back and blocks CHI's way somewhere else . <aft> MOT pulls arm away
CHI starts to run and pulls MOT's arm
MOT blocks CHI's way with arm
CHI continues to run and grabs MOT's hand
end of PCI- Crayons and Paper
CHI continues to move in a circle around MOT
MOT turns box around and puts paper in it
MOT puts a crayon in box
MOT puts a crayon in box
CHI has continued to make funny sounds and run around MOT and paper while MOT was talking
CHI reaches out for something on desk
CHI misses box and crayon lands next to MOT's knee
<bef> CHI walks around box . CHI picks up crayon . <aft> CHI lets crayon fall into the box
MOT puts lid on . <aft> MOT gets up and walks towards boxes

CHI walks to her left to see box
MOT walks towards middle of room
<bef> CHI starts walking towards middle of room
MOT stops walking and turns towards CHI
MOT puts box on floor and kneels down
MOT points to spot on floor right next to her
MOT looks at floor then at CHI
MOT pulls doll's house out of box and pushes box out of the way
CHI tilts head . <aft> CHI starts playing with door
CHI bends further down towards door and opens door
a doll falls out of house
CHI picks up doll and straightens up
<bef> MOT lies down on her side
CHI holds doll up in the air
